verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:7
verses.text: But thou shalt in any wise let the dam go, and take the young to thee; that it may be well with thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:8
verses.text: When thou buildest a new house, then thou shalt make a battlement for thy roof, that thou bring not blood upon thine house, if any man fall from thence.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:9
verses.text: Thou shalt not sow thy vineyard with divers seeds: lest the fruit of thy seed which thou hast sown, and the fruit of thy vineyard, be defiled.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 22:10
verses.text: Thou shalt not plow with an ox and an ass together.
